column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zei says : " Oh , it 's breathtaking !
#Text=We just like architecture .
#Text=" Zei says : " As do I. " Zei says : " My word !
#Text=The exquisite mosaic handiwork of this tile - rendered avian symbol ... Eh , nice owl .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " I know you 're back there .
#Text=" Zei says : " Hello , I 'm Professor Zei , head of anthropology at Ba Sing Se University .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " You should leave the way you came .
#Text=Unless you want to become a stuffed head of anthropology .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Are you the spirit who brought this library to the physical world ?
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Indeed , I am Wan Shi Tong , " He Who Knows Ten Thousand Things . "
#Text=And you are obviously humans , which , by the way , are no longer permitted in my study .
#Text=" Aang says : " What do you have against humans ?
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Hm !
#Text=Humans only bother learning things to get the edge on other humans .
#Text=Like that firebender who came to this place a few years ago , looking to destroy his enemy .
#Text=So ... who are you trying to destroy ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=No - no - no - no destroying .
#Text=We 're not into that .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Then why have you come here ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Um ... knowledge for knowledge 's sake ?
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " If you 're going to lie to an all - knowing spirit being , you should at least put some effort into it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm not lying , I 'm here with the Avatar , and he 's the bridge between our worlds .
#Text=He 'll vouch for me .
#Text=" Aang says : " Ow .
#Text=Uh , yeah , I 'll vouch .
#Text=We will not abuse the knowledge in your library , good spirit .
#Text=You have my word .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Hmm , very well .
#Text=I 'll let you peruse my vast collection on one condition .
#Text=To prove your worth as scholars , you have to contribute some worthwhile knowledge .
#Text=" Zei says : " Please accept this tome as a donation to your library .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " First edition , very nice .
#Text=" Katara says : " I have an authentic waterbending scroll .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Ooh , these illustrations are quite stylish .
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh ... oh , I know !
#Text=Hah !
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " I suppose that counts .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , great spirit , check this out .
#Text=Ta - da !
#Text=It 's a special knot .
#Text=That counts as knowledge !
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " You 're not very bright , are you ?
#Text=Enjoy the library .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Bright enough to fool you .
#Text="
